channel.title: Pure Nation - #1 Server for Pures!
channel.description:
[center][url=http://purenation-rsps.site11.com][IMG]http://i696.photobucket.com/albums/vv327/oz_vengance/cooltext765210572.png[/img][/url][center]
[center][url=http://purenation.net84.net/forum/Webclient.html][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/30jtkiw.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/home.png[/img][url=http://purenation.net84.net]Home[/url] [IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/cliiiiiiiiient.png[/img][url=https://dl.dropbox.com/s/ros9ip07y4pfwf1/Client.rar]Client Download![/url] [/center] [center][IMG]http://i254.photobucket.com/albums/hh104/romanmurzin/weblcient.png[/img][url=http://purenation.net84.net/forum/index.php?/topic/2-official-rules/page__pid__2#entry2]Rules[/url][/center]
[center][size=12pt]Pure Nation™ [/size]
The Only Server Based On Pures[/center]
[center][b]Developer:[/b] - Teeky Pk
[b]Staff Team:[/b] - OPEN - OPEN - OPEN - OPEN - OPEN[/center]
[center][b]Support Team:[/b] - Cowboy - OPEN - OPEN - OPEN - OPEN[/center]
[center][b]What is Pure Nation?[/b] Pure Nation is a Server for Pures, by Pures! we are a 1-35 Defence based server. We also have many features for clans such as, Fully functional Clan Wars, correct teleports into the wilderness, correct multi and single zones. We are also the first 718+ to have correct prayer delays for Nh Birds.[/center]
[center][b]So is it Spawn or Eco?[/b] We are a spawn pk based server BUT some items such as Chaotics, Overloads and extremes aren't spawnable you have to get 96herblore to make the Overloads and do a MiniGame for Chaotics. It prevents the chance of people prodding while pking.[/center]
[center][b]Is there any type of Pk System?[/b] Yes there is, once you kill a player within the Wilderness you receive 2 of the following items. 1) a Pk Token 2) 250K Cash 3) Random Pvp Drop[/center]
[center][b]What can i buy with a Pk Token?[/b] You can save your tokens up and buy items such as (I) Rings, RuneCrafting Robes, Vesta Longsword, Statius Warhammer ECT.[/center]
[center][b]What can i do with 250k?[/b] Well we have disabled cash from being spawned so if you save the coins up maybe you could buy a chaotic for cash off a player or even a Pk Item.[/center]
[center][b]Random Pvp drops?[/b] This is a new pk system for edgeville once you kill someone you get a chance of receiving a random drop it could be any at your 1st kill or 50th kill you'll get a random pvp drops, includes statues or better items.[/center]
[center][b]Server Content:[/b] - Flawless switching. - Great combat. - Granite Maul. - Pheonix Necklaces. - Dragon Scimtar special - Bolas - Pk Ranks, With scoreboard - Auras - Clan Wars. - Duel arena. - Fixed prayers - 50+ Players[/center]
[center][b]Client Content:[/b] - 728 Cache - Low to HD in Direct X or Safe Mode. - Clean and tidy. [/center]
[center] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qbVMRV2qW68[/center]
[center][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/1z1toxc.png[/img][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/34dius3.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Pure Nation - #1 Server for Pures!
item.dc:creator: @PureNation PureNation
item.description:
@PureNation wrote:

[center][center]

[center][/center]

[center]Home
Client Download! [/center]
[center]Rules[/center]

[center][size=12pt]Pure Nation™ [/size]

The Only Server Based On Pures[/center]

[center]Developer:

  • Teeky Pk

Staff Team:

  • OPEN
  • OPEN
  • OPEN
  • OPEN
  • OPEN[/center]

[center]Support Team:

  • Cowboy
  • OPEN
  • OPEN
  • OPEN
  • OPEN[/center]

[center]What is Pure Nation?
Pure Nation is a Server for Pures, by Pures! we are a 1-35 Defence based server. We also have many features for clans such as, Fully functional Clan Wars, correct teleports into the wilderness, correct multi and single zones. We are also the first 718+ to have correct prayer delays for Nh Birds.[/center]

[center]So is it Spawn or Eco?
We are a spawn pk based server BUT some items such as Chaotics, Overloads and extremes aren’t spawnable you have to get 96herblore to make the Overloads and do a MiniGame for Chaotics. It prevents the chance of people prodding while pking.[/center]

[center]Is there any type of Pk System?
Yes there is, once you kill a player within the Wilderness you receive 2 of the following items.

  1. a Pk Token
  2. 250K Cash
  3. Random Pvp Drop[/center]

[center]What can i buy with a Pk Token?
You can save your tokens up and buy items such as (I) Rings, RuneCrafting Robes, Vesta Longsword, Statius Warhammer ECT.[/center]

[center]What can i do with 250k?
Well we have disabled cash from being spawned so if you save the coins up maybe you could buy a chaotic for cash off a player or even a Pk Item.[/center]

[center]Random Pvp drops?
This is a new pk system for edgeville once you kill someone you get a chance of receiving a random drop it could be any at your 1st kill or 50th kill you’ll get a random pvp drops, includes statues or better items.[/center]

[center]Server Content:

  • Flawless switching.
  • Great combat.
  • Granite Maul.
  • Pheonix Necklaces.
  • Dragon Scimtar special
  • Bolas
  • Pk Ranks, With scoreboard
  • Auras
  • Clan Wars.
  • Duel arena.
  • Fixed prayers
  • 50+ Players[/center]

[center]Client Content:

  • 728 Cache
  • Low to HD in Direct X or Safe Mode.
  • Clean and tidy.
    [/center]

[center]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qbVMRV2qW68[/center]

[center][/center]

[center][/center]
